attributes.action: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to agree set an independent medical and legal aid insurance fund, for British Armed Forces personnel and/or their families, in case of they are Killed- and/or Wounded-in-the-Line-of-Duty in the service of the British Armed Forces. Which they and/or their family can access too, so they can employ independent advice and reprenstation, with regards deaths or injuries sustained-in-the-Line-of-Duty in the service of the British Armed Forces, so their own rights, interests and welfare is protected and looked after, with regards any claim for benefits, compensation, care/medical treatment, providing for disabilities, or dealing with the death of a love one, the likes of any legal hearing's. Lastly to provide assistance or legal services with regards any knock on consequence which could happen directly and/or indirectly because of a servicemen or women was killed and/or wounded etc.
attributes.creator_name: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[Disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[Disabled]

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
